name: QuantiModo
description: Track and optimize any variable on the web, iOS, Android, or Chrome

APP_DISPLAY_NAME.description: Should match the name you used in your config.xml

LOWERCASE_APP_NAME.description: Should match the name you used as the defaultApp in www/js/apps.js

QUANTIMODO_CLIENT_ID.description: The QuantiModo client id generated at https://app.quantimo.do/api/v2/apps

QUANTIMODO_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The QuantiModo client secret generated at https://app.quantimo.do/api/v2/apps
